message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.RO. 

The paper deals with analyzing human actions based on 3D skeleton data, which falls under computer vision (cs.CV). The use of RNN-based learning methods and LSTM suggests machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) as likely sub-categories. The focus on analyzing spatio-temporal domains and the use of gating mechanisms suggest multimedia (cs.MM) as a possible sub-category. Finally, the proposed method could have applications in robotics (cs.RO) for human-robot interaction.
